descriptionHTML:
★★★ RUNNING CHINESE FOR WEARABLE - ANDROID WEAR ★★★

When you are running or walking, you can study chinese word with this wearable application. This is very effective for your fitness & studying language, and easy to use. You can learn chinese word during your activity.

1. ANDROID WEARABLE DEVICES SUPPORT - SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE & LG G-WATCH
2. REALTIME BURNED CALORIE CHECK SUPPORT
3. REALTIME CHINESE WORD SUPPORT DURING YOUR ACTIVITY

- O2MOBILE SOFTWARE Inc -
